#How to install eclipse and configure.

= Introduction =

How to configure eclipse.

= Installation =

Download Eclipse Indigo (Eclipse IDE for Java EE Developers, 212 MB) for 
Windows 32 Bit at :
http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/

Unzip and install it to : C:\eclipse-3.7
Create a workspace folder at : C:\workspace\users\workspace-eclipse-3.7-application
